job.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
job.description:
At Starship, we’re working hard to create the healthy future we all deserve by transforming the way people pay for healthcare. We’re passionate about empowering our customers to take greater control of their financial health and personal wellness, building a better tomorrow through superior technology and user experience.
Launched in 2018, our team of engineers, designers, and strategists are redefining the $65 billion health saving industry by building innovative solutions for saving, spending, and investing for healthcare. We’re bringing together exceptional talent from various disciplines and industries to shape the future of health savings and improve the lives of our customers.
As Software Engineer, you’ll work alongside our Senior Engineering Manager to take our product to the next level by tightening integration and enhancing compliance with industry standards. In this role, you’d work on architecting, designing, and implementing a system where delivering secure information in real time is essential.
We seek out engineers who are hard-skilled software pros but also thinkers and tinkerers who find creative solutions for complex problems and challenge the status quo. We love automation, code review, and continuous integration, and you should too. At Starship, we’re constantly iterating and improving our products to provide our members with the best experience possible.
What you’ll be doing
Designing scalable and resilient data pipelines and handle exponential member growth with confidence
Contributing to an event driven software stack to keep auditors happy
Designing data models and workflows to make use of health financial data
Collaborating with engineers and product managers to make sure we're building the right solutions for the right problems
Developing new user-facing features
Building reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimizing application for maximum speed and scalability
Thoughtful communication through code and design review
Striving to build great experiences, and putting users ahead of technology
Collaborating with engineers and product managers to make sure we're building the right solutions for the right problems
Improving our current tech-stack, found here https://stackshare.io/starship/starship
What you'll bring to the team
A willingness to work in a fast-paced startup environment
Ability to dive into complex systems and understand how they work
Experience in implementing testable business logic that is secure and easy to maintain
Experience with React, React Native, Javascript/Typescript, and Node.js
Experience in building and consuming various API endpoints (GraphQL) and working on payments features or companies
Familiarity with message brokers and event streams—e.g., AWS SNS, SQS, Azure ServiceBus, or similar
Experience working in high security environments—e.g., payments, healthcare
Experience in building both web and app products
iOS and Android experience is a plus
Motion experience is a plus
You work with a sense of empathy for others, both end users and your fellow engineers
What Starship offers
Welcoming, diverse, and interesting colleagues from all walks of life
Competitive compensation packages, including equity
Comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance
Of course, the best HSA!
Flexible schedules and time off
New equipment so you can do your best work
